numberTooSmall: The number is too small. At least: {0}.
numberTooBig: The number is too big. At most: {0}.
invalidInteger: The value is not an integer.
textTooSmall: The length of text is too small. Current: {0}, at least: {1}.
textTooBig: The length of text is too big. Current: {0}, at most: {1}.
dateIsEarly: The date is too early. Current: {0}, at least: {1}.
dateIsLate: The date is too late. Current: {0}, at most: {1}.
invalidTextContainNumber: Invalid text. Cannot contains numbers or special characters.
invalidTextContainSpec: Invalid text. Cannot contains special characters.
